title: CLDF dataset derived from Birchall et al.'s "A Combined Comparative and Phylogenetic Analysis of the Chapacuran Language Family" from 2016
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Birchall J, Dunn M, & Greenhill SJ. 2016. A Combined Comparative and Phylogenetic Analysis of the Chapacuran Language Family. International Journal of American Linguistics 82(3). 255–284.
